dialogueTree.title: Spring Mattress: "The greasy old spring mattress lies..."
dialogueTree.text: The greasy old spring mattress lies in the corner.

links.title: You: "Maybe a little shut-eye, just for a..."
links.text: Maybe a little shut-eye, just for an hour... [Go to sleep.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's better to get back to t..."
links.text: "Maybe it's better to get back to the mainland? Rest there -- you've earned it."

links.title: Cuno: ""What, you wanna like... live on th..."
links.text: "What, you wanna like... live on this fucking island now?" He crosses his arms. "Go sleep in your own bed."

links.title: Spring Mattress: "Maybe it's actually better on the m..."
links.text: Maybe it's actually better on the mainland... in your own bed. This place is getting less welcoming.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Also -- what if the bad thing happe..."
links.text: Also -- what if the bad thing happens again?

links.title: Spring Mattress: "You face the concrete wall. There's..."
links.text: You face the concrete wall. There's less light there, in the dark corner. Like a dog you lie there...

links.title: Endurance: "You didn't realize how tired you we..."
links.text: You didn't realize how tired you were. Your body is still nowhere near healed...

links.title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
links.text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

links.title: Spring Mattress: "The blanket feels cold. The entire..."
links.text: The blanket feels cold. The entire room does -- concrete and cold. Minutes pass. Half an hour maybe? The sounds of the sea beyond grow distant. Your eyelids close. Until...

links.title: You: "Until?"
links.text: Until?

links.title: Spring Mattress: "You feel yourself standing up in th..."
links.text: You feel yourself standing up in the darkness. Right next to the mattress. Slowly, the world begins to hatch from the blackness. It's evening...

links.title: Spring Mattress: "Sleep."
links.text: Sleep.

links.title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
links.text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

links.title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
links.text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

links.title: Spring Mattress: "You face the concrete wall. There's..."
links.text: You face the concrete wall. There's less light there, in the dark corner. Like a dog you lie there...

links.title: Endurance: "You didn't realize how tired you we..."
links.text: You didn't realize how tired you were. Your body is still nowhere near healed...

links.title: You: "Pull your legs under your chin."
links.text: Pull your legs under your chin.

links.title: Spring Mattress: "The blanket feels cold. It's someon..."
links.text: The blanket feels cold. It's someone else's blanket, and the room is all concrete and cold. Sounds of the sea beyond grow distant, slowly. Your eyelids close.

links.title: Spring Mattress: "Sleep."
links.text: Sleep.

links.title: You: "No time to rest now. [Leave.]"
links.text: No time to rest now. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Any time. If you need a rest..."
links.text: "Yes. Any time. If you need a rest *later*, it's okay by me."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You don't have to be a hero."
links.text: You don't have to be a hero.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cool, whatever. Cuno doesn't reall..."
links.text: "Cool, whatever. Cuno doesn't really give a shit."

dialogueTree.title: Spring Mattress: "The greasy old spring mattress lies..."
dialogueTree.text: The greasy old spring mattress lies in the corner, fresh linen under the heavy karakul cover.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The offer still stands," he says,..."
links.text: "The offer still stands," he says, looking out the pillbox window. "Take it -- you don't look so good."

links.title: Endurance: "The bed is quite inviting, all thin..."
links.text: The bed is quite inviting, all things considered. It's much warmer inside than out there...

links.title: Cuno: ""I'm gonna say it again -- Cuno doe..."
links.text: "I'm gonna say it again -- Cuno doesn't feel like carrying your corpse off this island, so maybe you should fucking crash?"

links.title: Endurance: "Still rather inviting, all things c..."
links.text: Still rather inviting, all things considered. It's much warmer inside than out there...

dialogueTree.title: Spring Mattress: "There's a greasy old spring mattres..."
dialogueTree.text: There's a greasy old spring mattress in the corner, resting on piles of softcover books. White linen and a pillow are visible under a worn-out karakul blanket.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone has been squatting here."..."
links.text: "Someone has been squatting here." The lieutenant inspects the bed. "The linen is fresh. Recently washed."

links.title: You: ""How recently...""
links.text: "How recently..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts you, mak..."
links.text: A flash of pain interrupts you, making you wince instead of letting the words out.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, officer..." He looks at..."
links.text: "You know, officer..." He looks at you with a touch of concern. "You *can* rest here if you're feeling tired. I will keep watch. You could use some rest for what's ahead."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You force the rest of the sentence..."
links.text: You force the rest of the sentence out through pain, thick as molasses, no longer able to hear yourself speak.

links.title: You: ""Do you think whoever slept here is..."
links.text: "Do you think whoever slept here is..."

links.title: You: ""There are signs that someone... li..."
links.text: "There are signs that someone... lives..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Check this shit. Someone's been sq..."
links.text: "Check this shit. Someone's been squatting here." The kid waves his hand at the bed. "Cuno knows because this shit looks like Cuno's place."

links.title: You: ""How recently...""
links.text: "How recently..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts you, mak..."
links.text: A flash of pain interrupts you, making you grimace instead of spewing out the words.

links.title: Cuno: ""Hey... Cuno doesn't wanna *hurt yo..."
links.text: "Hey... Cuno doesn't wanna *hurt your feelings*, but you look like shit. Maybe you should lie down in the bed -- like recover. Before you die."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You force the rest of the sentence..."
links.text: You force the rest of the sentence out through pain, thick as molasses, without really hearing it.

links.title: You: ""Do you think whoever slept here is..."
links.text: "Do you think whoever slept here is..."

links.title: You: ""There are signs that someone... li..."
links.text: "There are signs that someone... lives..."

links.title: You: "Inspect the linen."
links.text: Inspect the linen.

links.title: Spring Mattress: "It stands out because it's freshly..."
links.text: It stands out because it's freshly washed.

links.title: Logic: "Someone has been squatting here. Ve..."
links.text: Someone has been squatting here. Very recently -- the fire guy the twins mentioned?

links.title: You: "How recently..."
links.text: How recently...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts your tho..."
links.text: A flash of pain interrupts your thought, making you grimace.

links.title: Endurance: "Technically speaking, you *could* r..."
links.text: Technically speaking, you *could* rest here if you're hurting... someone else has. It should be possible.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The mattress is soggy, but that lin..."
links.text: The mattress is soggy, but that linen feels more inviting than the pain and exhaustion. It's not too cold here...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You push the rest of the thought th..."
links.text: You push the rest of the thought through pain thick as molasses, without really concentrating on it.

links.title: You: "Could they still be..."
links.text: Could they still be...

links.title: You: "Huh, I wonder if..."
links.text: Huh, I wonder if...

links.title: Logic: "Someone has been squatting here. Ve..."
links.text: Someone has been squatting here. Very recently.
